SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope the public realizes how important our schools are to our youth…”

– Mrs. Jennifer Galmoff, Middle School English Educator @KA_Intermediate @clarionu @GannonU https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/public-realize-importance-schools-youth/
